---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
dat<-read.csv("data.csv")
summary(dat)
```

```{r}
needs(tidyr)

needs(lubridate)
dat$year <- parse_date_time(dat$year, "y", tz = "Africa/Johannesburg")

needs(dplyr)
data<- dat %>%
  mutate(field = as.factor(field),
         variety = as.factor(variety))


needs(ggplot2)
steve <- ggplot(data=data, aes(x=year, y=Hyield, colour = variety)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Year") +
  theme_bw() +
  ylab("Yield (kg/hectare)") +
 # geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~ field, ncol = 5) 

ggsave("steve.pdf", dpi = 600)
  
```
